text: Ermengarde de Carcassonne (d. 1099), was a French noble, ruling vassal vicomtesse of Carcassonne in 1082-1099. == References == * Dictionnaire de l’Art de Vérifier les Dates“, Achille François & Jouffroy d’Abbans; 1854 Category:11th-century births Category:1099 deaths Category:11th-century French people Category:11th-century women rulers Category:French vicomtesses Category:Viscounts of Carcassonne
title: Ermengarde de Carcassonne
